attributes.action: Reward people who recycle (based on the weight of recycled items in a week/month)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that not enough people are recycling. 

80% of rubbish dumped is recycable. If the British Government make a reward scheme based on the weight of total items recycled in a week/month then the government can give some sort of reward. 

I believe that for this small price, British citizens will want to recycle more. I think this is a great idea into making more people recycle. 

If you agree, sign up!
